messages.text: Lufthansa Group Inspirational AI flight assistant. Nice to meet you!
Hi, I am Paul, your inspirational Digital Travel Assistant. I am here to help find a travel destination and travel plan for you. When you think of holiday, what comes to mind?
Thank you for providing the details. To proceed, could you please confirm the travel dates and any other preferences such as the number of passengers, cabin class, etc.?
Hello again! To continue, could you please confirm the travel dates and any other preferences such as the number of passengers, cabin class, etc.?
Thank you for letting me know about the number of passengers. To proceed, could you please confirm the travel dates and any other preferences such as the cabin class, etc.?
Thank you for providing the travel date. To proceed, could you please confirm any other preferences such as the cabin class, etc.?
I have all the information needed to search for flights. Please hold on while I look up the options for you.
